mapper.sql: id, title, link, source, author, recommendation_type, catetory_id, recommend_date
mapper.insert: insert into tb_recommendation ( id, title, link, source, author, recommendation_type, catetory_id, recommend_date ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catetoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommendation_type = #{recommendationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, catetory_id = #{catetoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend_date = #{recommendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into tb_recommendation
id,
title,
link,
source,
author,
recommendation_type,
catetory_id,
recommend_date,

mapper.update:
update tb_recommendation
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommendation_type = #{recommendationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
catetory_id = #{catetoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend_date = #{recommendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_recommendation set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommendation_type = #{recommendationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, catetory_id = #{catetoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend_date = #{recommendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
